thread.title: Arsenal player ratings as Theo Walcott and Gunners defence struggle as Gunners slump to West Brom defeat
thread.title_full: Arsenal player ratings as Theo Walcott and Gunners defence struggle as Gunners slump to West Brom defeat

author: James Nursey
title: Arsenal player ratings as Theo Walcott and Gunners defence struggle as Gunners slump to West Brom defeat
text:
Arsenal player ratings as Theo Walcott and Gunners defence struggle as Gunners slump to West Brom defeat Craig Dawson was at the double to down Arsenal at the Hawthorns Share Craig Dawson celebrates scoring West Brom's third goal (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get Arsenal FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsenal 's season continues to go from bad to worse after a Craig Dawson-inspired West Brom put the Gunners to the sword at the Hawthorns. 
The defender headed home in either half as the visiting defence fell to pieces. Hal Robson-Kanu was also on the scoresheet while Alexis Sanchez found the net for Arsene Wenger's side. 
Here, James Nursey rates the players on both sides. 
West Brom 
Looked calm and composed in home goal 
Dawson 8 MOTM Two fine headed goals from corners 
McAuley 8 The old-timer continues to impress 
Evans 8 Stopper was typically classy at the back 
Nyom 7 Nearly set-up a goal with fine run and cross 
Chadli 7 Superb corner for opener and teed up second Nacer Chadli impressed in West Brom's midfield (Photo: REUTERS) Read More
